item.description:
Gaming System: Hero, 5th Edition, Fantasy Hero Supplement
Campaign Setting: Tuala Morn (Celtic derived)
Gamemaster: Kevin Brady (first Hero campaign, 20+ years experience with other game systems)
Number of Players: four, could work with as few as three
Ages/Sexes: All, but be prepared for possible graphic violence descriptions and rated R language occasionally Fantasy Hero allows characters of any sort of conception. It is a gaming system which allots points to each person, which can be spent on stats, spell-abilities, equipment, and any of a number of other dimensions of the character. Points can be increased by taking "disadvantages", which also act as plot hooks for the GM. The wold is very large, flexible, full of political intrigue, small and large quests of a variety of sorts. My intent for the first meetup is for people to come over, see the books, get an idea of the system by making a character each, discussing the campaign, and then plan the first session.

Suggested Time
Saturday, June 20, 2009 3:00 PM

Suggested Place
44 Phillips Street, Wickford, Rhode Island (my apartment)
